traits.locale_text: Each time the Cyber mastiff takes damage, Solomorne's crit chance, damage, and dodge reduction are increased by 5% for each stack of this Fury if he uses {g|f:2de518e4ecaa4cba86aef0a703dc7e42}Outburst of Fury{/g}
